name: 口筆譯入門
description: 本課程介紹口筆譯產業以及口筆譯技巧與實務，搭配課堂實作演練，使學生具備對翻譯的基本認識、提升學生的翻譯能力與繼續進修的興趣。學生在修畢本課程後，應能： 1. 說明翻譯有哪些基本原則與精神。 2. 瞭解口筆譯產業的概況。 3. 獲得練習基礎口筆譯的方法。 4. 檢視自身對於口筆譯的興趣與潛能。
goals: 了解翻譯有哪些基本原則與精神
瞭解口筆譯產業的概況
獲得練習基礎口筆譯的方法
檢視自身對於口筆譯的興趣與潛能
syllabus:
授課方式：16+2週：彈性教學授課方式以學生自主學習和撰寫研究專題報告為主。  
The course schedule above may be changed for any reason at the direction of the instructor. I look forward to a productive semester JThe systematic study of translation as an academic discipline has really begun in the second half of the 20th century and has expanded explosively in recent years around the world. The purpose of this course is to introduce students to major concepts and problems arise in translating and interpreting: the process and product of translation, translation methods and models, equivalent effect, functional and discourse analysis approaches, cultural and philosophical aspects of translation, and others. Students are expected to develop their understanding of the issues of Translation Studies and to apply the theories to their research and practice.
